Class AuthFilter

java.lang.Object
org.veupathdb.lib.container.jaxrs.server.middleware.AuthFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
jakarta.ws.rs.container.ContainerRequestFilter
@Provider @Priority(4) public class AuthFilter extends Object implements jakarta.ws.rs.container.ContainerRequestFilter
Provides client authentication checks for resource classes or methods annotated with @Authenticated.

Authentication is performed by extracting the components of the Auth-Key request header and validating those components against the user database.

See Also:
  • Authenticated
